text:
@WhiteHouse Success? I’d hate to see what you fools think is failure. 

120,000 dead
43 million unemployed
No plan
No clue
And that’s just covid-19

Rampant voter suppression
Corrupt DOJ
Openly embracing white nationalism 
Corrupt Senate majority
Success & the GOP, are mutually exclusive.
